text.description:
Thanks to Keeps for sponsoring this video! Head to https://keeps.com/BEFRS to get a special offer!
👕 BEFRS MERCH » https://befrs.shop/ 🎥 WATCH OUR MAIN CHANNEL » http://bit.ly/BestEverFoodReviewShow 🇮🇳BEST EVER FOOD INDIA » https://www.youtube.com/@besteverfoodindia ☕️ BEFRS COFFEE » https://bestevercoffee.lacaph.com/
1. Stripchezze Food Truck Address: 110 S Rainbow Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89145, United States Website: stripchezze.com
2.Birrieria Dimas Address: 2987 Las Vegas Blvd N ste 13, North Las Vegas, NV 89030, United States Website: places.singleplatform.com
3. QUP! BBQ Website: http://qupbbq.com
4. Endless Pastabilities Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/endlesspastabilitieslv/
Follow us on Instagram: 📷 Sonny Side: @besteverfoodreviewshow - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 🎬CREDITS: VIDEO EDITOR » Hà Nhật Linh CAMERA OPERATOR » Wife COLOR & MASTER » Nguyễn Quang Dũng
text.fulltitle: Food Truck Face Off in Las Vegas!! Good, Bad and Ugly!!
text.title: Food Truck Face Off in Las Vegas!! Good, Bad and Ugly!!
text.uploader: More Best Ever Food Review Show
